remarks: AdditionMultiplicationRightDistribution generator rule.  (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 7-Apr-2020.)
statement:
int-rightdistd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
int-rightdistd.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
int-rightdistd.3 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
int-rightdistd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
int-rightdistd $p |- ( ph -> ( B x. ( C + D ) ) = ( ( A x. C ) + ( A x. D ) ) ) $.
